description: Collect feedback on training sessions to improve future programmes.
name: Training Evaluation Form

steps.title: We Value Your Feedback!
steps.text: Thank you for participating in our training session. Your feedback is crucial in helping us improve the quality of our training programmes. Please take a few moments to complete this evaluation form and share your thoughts on various aspects of the training.

blocks.label: Email Address
blocks.help: Provide your email address for follow-up or further communication.
blocks.name: email

blocks.label: Training Title
blocks.help: Specify the title of the training session you attended.
blocks.name: training_title

blocks.label: Training Date
blocks.help: Enter the date of the training session.
blocks.name: training_date

blocks.label: Trainer's Name
blocks.help: Provide the name of the trainer or instructor.
blocks.name: trainer_name

blocks.label: Overall Satisfaction
blocks.help: Rate your overall satisfaction with the training from 1 to 5 stars.
blocks.name: overall_satisfaction

blocks.label: Training Content Quality
blocks.help: Rate the quality of the training content from 1 to 5 stars.
blocks.name: training_content_quality

blocks.label: Trainer's Effectiveness
blocks.help: Rate the trainer's effectiveness in delivering the material from 1 to 5 stars.
blocks.name: trainer_effectiveness

blocks.label: Course Structure
blocks.help: Rate the structure and organisation of the course from 1 to 5 stars.
blocks.name: course_structure

blocks.label: Relevance to Job
blocks.help: Rate how relevant the training was to your job from 1 to 5 stars.
blocks.name: relevance_to_job

blocks.label: Pace of Training
blocks.help: Rate the pace at which the training was conducted from 1 to 5 stars.
blocks.name: pace_of_training

blocks.label: Suggestions for Improvement
blocks.help: Provide any suggestions for improving the training session.
blocks.name: suggestions

blocks.label: Additional Comments
blocks.help: Optional: Include any additional comments or feedback about the training session.
blocks.name: comments

blocks.label: Would You Recommend This Training?
blocks.help: Would you recommend this training to others?
blocks.name: would_recommend
